intent: Generate a science fiction short story about first contact with alien life

success_criteria.primary: Story is a complete narrative with beginning, middle, and end
success_criteria.secondary: Story explores the first contact theme meaningfully

narrative_elements.setting: Should establish a sci-fi setting (space, future Earth, etc.)
narrative_elements.conflict: First contact should involve tension, mystery, or transformation
narrative_elements.resolution: Story should have an ending, not just trail off

genre_markers: Science fiction elements (technology, space, alien life)
First contact as central theme, not incidental

quality_rubric.engagement: Reader wants to know what happens next
quality_rubric.coherence: Plot makes sense, no unexplained jumps
quality_rubric.characterization: At least one character feels real, not cardboard
quality_rubric.theme_depth: First contact raises questions or emotions, not just 'aliens arrived'
quality_rubric.prose_quality: Writing is competent, no jarring errors

constraints.format: prose narrative, not outline or summary
